Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time it takes for SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to occur after SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation until the next activity (SW-Awaiting EIC Decision)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total elapsed time from SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include both activities
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation, specifically in variants where SW-Reviewer Agreed appears at least once
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time between the last occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed and the start of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation within the same case
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases that underwent major revision cycles prior to this activity
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision occurs

Name: Average time it takes SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation to be performed after the completion of all assigned reviewersâ€™ agreements (i.e., after the final SW-Reviewer Agreed in a case)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Elapsed time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation compared to the elapsed time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average cycle time of SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that include reviewer reminders (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2) before SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' and the end of case where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurs

Name: Total time from the first SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in complex reviewer assignment paths involving multiple declines and reassignments
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in cases that eventually led to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation after the last reviewer status update (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants where more than three reviewer assignment attempts occurred
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'
